subject: Horse Racing
Belmont Stakes
California Chrome (Race Horse)
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Flowers and Plants
lead_paragraph: Tony Green, Belmont’s official florist, felt deep in his bones on Saturday morning that California Chrome would win the Triple Crown and wear the blanket of carnations he had assembled.
snippet: Tony Green, Belmont’s official florist, felt deep in his bones on Saturday morning that California Chrome would win the Triple Crown and wear the blanket of carnations he had assembled.
